mapper.update: update document set status = #{status} where doc_id = #{docId}
update document set is_delete = 1 where doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.delete: update document set is_delete = 0 where doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.select: select users.* from users, access where users.user_id = access.user_id and access.doc_id = #{docId} and access.access_level = 2
SELECT * from document where is_delete = 1 ORDER BY created_time DESC
select * from document where doc_name like '%${name}%' and is_delete = 1
select count(*) from document where doc_name like concat('%', #{fileName}, '%') and type like concat('%', #{type}, '%') and is_delete = 1
